Kennedy-Turner, K., Kirkpatrick, A.,Veronneau, M-H., Dickson, D. J., Stack, D. M., Ledingham, J. E., Schwartzman, A. E., & Serbin, L. A. (2018). The pursuit of higher education. Five-minute blitz presentation at FRQ Emotional Competence Team research symposium.

Kennedy-Turner, K., Cloutier, B., Stack, D. M., Ledingham, J. E., Schwartzman, A. E., & Serbin, L. A. (2017).
